svg.text: Validate a revised Business Manager Selection Assessment measuring technical knowledge and four behavioural competencies
for a major financial services institution — spanning instrument design, iterative client consultation, piloting, CTT/IRT analysis, and simulation.
Structured client meetings driving iterative instrument conceptualisation, redesign and rebuilding prior to piloting
Score distributions per section and subgroup
Cronbach's α and McDonald's ω reliability
χ² diagnostics · item fit and flagging
Jurgen Becker, PhD · AX Consult Group
